episodes.title: The Legends of CHIMA
episodes.description: Laval the Lion and Cragger the Crocodile are the best of friends. But when young Cragger becomes king of the Crocodiles, he tries to conquer all of the CHI. Former friends become worst enemies.

episodes.title: The Great Story
episodes.description: King Cragger’s mischievous sister Crooler is scheming and uses a mysterious plant to cloud Cragger’s mind. This causes him to cause mayhem at the ceremonial CHI day Speedor races and he plans a massive attack on the Lion Temple. But Laval still believes in a peaceful solution.

episodes.title: The Warrior Within
episodes.description: Cragger tricks Laval into withholding CHI from the Crocodile tribe. This reignites the hostilities between the Lions and Crocodiles. Laval must frantically escape the wrath of the Crocs and somehow get rid of the CHI before his father finds out.

episodes.title: The Joy Ride
episodes.description: Laval and Eris the Eagle take a Lion tank for a ride around CHIMA. But it may not be such a good idea. Laval has no driving skills and Eris has little sense of direction. But during their trip they discover that Cragger has employed a tribe of beavers in an elaborate plot to steal all of the CHI.

episodes.title: Market Day
episodes.description: Each month there is a big market at the Speedor races. Laval and Eris go there, but Cragger has hired the Ravens to steal Laval’s precious Speedor. And suddenly the prize of the races, the Golden CHI, has also disappeared.

episodes.title: Attack on Eagle Spire
episodes.description: The Crocodiles hire the Ravens to trick the Wolves into attacking the Eagle Spires. But it is all part of an elaborate plot to harm both the Lions, Eagles and Wolves. Laval and Eris must act quickly to save the day.

episodes.title: The Hundred Year Moon
episodes.description: At the night of the Hundred Year Moon, the Wolves are running wild and causing havoc. Crooler kidnaps a young gorilla girl to lure Laval, Eris and Gorzan the Gorilla out to rescue her. It is a very dangerous night, but finally Skinnet the Skunk’s foul odor may prove useful.

episodes.title: The Biggest Race of All
episodes.description: The Sacred Pool in the Lion Temple has produced the biggest orb of Golden CHI ever. Both the Wolves and Crocodiles are scheming and Cragger has hired CHIMA’s greatest Speedor Rider – Dom de la Woosh - to win the CHI for him. But another mysterious rider, ShadoWind, also enters the race.

episodes.title: Gorillas Gone Wild
episodes.description: Cragger angers the Gorilla tribe and they march to the Crocodile Swamp to teach him a lesson. But the Gorilla Mechs are not fit for the swampy water and the Lions and Eagles must come to the rescue. The only problem is that the Lions don’t like water ... at all!

episodes.title: Foxtrot
episodes.description: Crooler has lost faith in Cragger. With the aid of the Wolves she causes chaos at the Speedor races and tries to steal all of the CHI from the Lion Temple. The mysterious Speedor rider ShadoWind shows up again - but just whose side is he really on?

episodes.title: The CHI Jackers
episodes.description: The Wolves have become strong because of the stolen CHI. And now they are stealing even more. Soon all the other tribes of CHIMA have none. Laval and Eris must find a new, clever and “Wolf proof ” way to get CHI to the tribes.

episodes.title: Balancing Act
episodes.description: The Wolves are still stealing CHI and everyone else has very little. When a load of CHI falls into the Gorge of Eternal Depth, Laval, Eris and Gorzan must try to retrieve it. But the Wolves are more powerful than ever and even Cragger must act against them.

episodes.title: Crocodile Tears
episodes.description: Cragger and the Crocodiles are taken prisoners by the Wolves. But Laval is determined to free his old friend. Laval, Eris and the mysterious ShadoWind attempt a rescue ... but something about ShadoWind isn’t quite right.

episodes.title: Fake CHI, Real Trouble
episodes.description: Cragger has been freed and wants to give out CHI to all tribes of CHIMA, but he has none. He employs a strange Raven alchemist to produce some fake CHI. But the fake CHI has some very unexpected side effects and the alchemist has an agenda of his own.

episodes.title: Ravens vs. Eagles
episodes.description: CHIMA is peaceful yet again. Laval and Cragger go on a joyful Speedor cruise. But the Ravens use the peace to move into Eagle Spires. The Eagles try to get rid of them, but the Ravens are very persistent. It will be up to Eris to trick them to leave.

episodes.title: Reunion Gone Wrong
episodes.description: Laval and Cragger attempt to get all of the tribes to agree on a lasting peace in CHIMA. But Crooler creates a strange fog that makes everyone become very powerful and angry ... especially Cragger. Soon the peace talks turn into one big fight and Laval must go to extreme lengths to save the day.

episodes.title: Laval in Exile
episodes.description: Laval’s actions to break up the fighting at the peace talks force the Lion King Lagravis to exile his own son. Laval learns that Cragger has imprisoned his father in his absence. He must free him ... but how can he do that when he has been exiled?

episodes.title: The Black Cloud
episodes.description: A strange Black cloud has appeared around the floating Mt. Cavora, source of the CHI. Laval and Eris investigate but the cloud seems to fight back. The tribes of CHIMA must all join in the fight against the cloud. But the worst is yet to come...

episodes.title: CHIMA Falls
episodes.description: The CHI falls have run dry. Eris and the Beavers try to get to mount Cavora to learn why. The Crocodiles blame the Lions and are rallying the Wolves, Ravens and even Rhinos for a large scale attack to conquer the remaining CHI ... the greatest battle is imminent.

episodes.title: For CHIMA!
episodes.description: The CHI falls of Mt. Cavora are still not running. The Black Cloud still looms. The battle for the CHI is on. The Lion Temple is under attack and it is only a matter of time before is will be overrun by Crocodiles, Wolves, Ravens and Rhinos. Only Laval believes in a peaceful solution ... but it is a long shot.
